title: Find the Period
text: For the standard tangent function $$f(x)=Atan(Bx-C)$$, the period is $$\frac{\pi}{|B|}$$. So T $$=$$ $$\frac{\pi}{4}$$.

title: Find the Horizontal Shift
text: For the standard tangent function $$f(x)=Atan(Bx-C)$$, the phase shift is $$\frac{C}{B}$$. So $$h=\frac{32}{4}=8$$.
